title: Is this the Rtchet & Clank advice board?
body: Pls guys I need the help I trying to beat Dcotor Nefarius and he is just too hard I don know what I am doins  wrong can someone tell me how they win this fight :/

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Gordons Coming,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=8mzzFQeh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-25T00:16:51.754+0000)
>
> NO THIS IS PATRICK!

hell patrick I need you're help wiht beating this boss, plz can u look into ur heart to gibve me a hand

> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=8mzzFQeh,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-10-25T10:14:16.951+0000)

> can u look into ur *heart* to gibve me a hand

You called?

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=8mzzFQeh,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-10-25T23:48:21.633+0000)
>
> You called?

Tyes how does I make victory wen fihgting B2 BRAWLERRR!!!!! BRAWLERRRR **BRAWLERRRRRRRRRRR**
You need to use the reserve inticulator. Works 100%, ez game ez life.

>Is this the Rtchet & Clank advice board?

https://cdn.meme.am/instances/65026666.jpg

Hguys just went back 2 play rathcet and clank 2 becuz I got confused and played game in wrong order.

anyways I trying to do the B2 BRAWLERS, BRAWLER **BRAWLERRRR!** but he is vry hard ofr me. someone pls give me tips

The first phase just use the Bouncer (if it's upgraded all the way it will do ALOT more damage). Then when he's on the 2nd phase, use the Bouncer again until it runs out of ammo. Then just use whatever you can to defeat him. The last phase ***MODERATE SPOILER*** when he uses the Bi-Obliterator, Quark gives you the flying ship (I forgot the name). When you use this, keep flying in circles. When Nefarious shoots the tracking rockets, don't take your eye off of them.
6 years ago
 - By Dr_HAX from [Gamefaqs forums](http://www.gamefaqs.com/ps2/919902-ratchet-and-clank-up-your-arsenal/answers/183143-how-do-i-beat-the-last-boss-dr-nefarious).
